code: import React from"react";import Particles from"react-particles-js";function ParticlesContainer(){var maxViewPortLength=Math.max(window.innerHeight,window.innerWidth);var numOfParticles=maxViewPortLength/16;return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{id:"particles-div"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Particles,{params:{particles:{color:{value:"#ADB5BD"},line_linked:{color:{value:"#ADB5BD"}},number:{value:numOfParticles},size:{value:2},move:{speed:1}},interactivity:{events:{onhover:{enable:true,mode:"repulse"}}}},style:{width:'100%',height:'100%',backgroundColor:'transparent'}}));}export default ParticlesContainer;
